title: Absence without leave
context: [ยง124A-121] Absence without leave. Any person subject to this chapter who, without authority: (1) Fails to go to the person&rsquo;s appointed place of duty at the time prescribed; (2) Goes from that place; or (3) Absents the person&rsquo;s self or remains absent from the person&rsquo;s unit, organization, or place of duty at which the person is required to be at the time prescribed; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
